title: At the end of Season 4 I reported my best friend for being ELO boosted.
body:
And nothing was done about it, in fact he's being boosted to Diamond again as we speak.
Good job Riot was the 50+ pictures and video evidence I sent you not enough?

Guy has never played top lane in his life, he mains jungle, he was bronze 4 a month or two before Season 4 ended, he finished in DiamondV, now funny enough the fact he went from bronze to diamond that quickly should have triggered something, 550 wins, 700 losses to Diamond? Yeah okay. I see it may have been legit, despite the fact he has never played the champions he used, in fact he bought them for the booster solely!
Yet, he got away with it, lmfao, gj Riot.

replies.body: Riot is too busy increasing the price of RP.
snitch n1gga that sh1t that we don't like.

> [{quoted}](name=Homura Akemi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iU07QYjz,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-06T09:17:23.622+0000)
>
> snitch n1gga that sh1t that we don't like.

I didn't say %%%% until he bragged about it irl, and got into a local tournament and then got stomped.

Good on you for reporting it.
I hope Riot puts in a strategy to deal with this.
Maybe it will be enforced with the new updated tribunal.

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iU07QYjz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-06T09:02:58.756+0000)
>
> such friend.

I reported him so he'd learn, trust me when I told him irl he just laughed it off and said Riot wouldn't do anything, we both new Riot wouldn't do anything. idc if people get boosted, it's when people start to brag about it that it annoys me.
This discussion section proves board's community is a bunch of nubs that would rather keep their homosexual relationships than do the right thing.

What a friend you are, sounds like youre just jealous your friend got a boost, and youre probs stuck in bronze.

Pass the salt, my chips taste a bit bland.

> [{quoted}](name=nightingale123,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iU07QYjz,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-03-06T20:38:48.361+0000)
>
> What a friend you are, sounds like youre just jealous your friend got a boost, and youre probs stuck in bronze.
> 
> Pass the salt, my chips taste a bit bland.

if you need to do scummy things to get ahead you're not worth being my friend.

> [{quoted}](name=nightingale123,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iU07QYjz,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-03-06T20:38:48.361+0000)
>
> What a friend you are, sounds like youre just jealous your friend got a boost, and youre probs stuck in bronze.
> 
> Pass the salt, my chips taste a bit bland.

Despite the fact I was ranked higher than him, ok.
Do you have the evidence from your report tickets that were sent to the support services of  Riot games?
Riot is definitely gonna ban him soon, I've purchased a lv 30 ac last year and got perma banned after 3 months.

> [{quoted}](name=A for Acid,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iU07QYjz,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-06T09:22:43.535+0000)
>
> Riot is definitely gonna ban him soon, I've purchased a lv 30 ac last year and got perma banned after 3 months.

He was boosted every season from 3 - 5.
why would you report your best friend for anything your a %%%%
